title: The preparation of [1,2,4]triazolo[1,5-a]pyrimidines catalyzed by Schiff base zinc(II) complex supported on magnetite nanoparticles under mild conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19167-19173
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02339K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ahmad Reza Moosavi-Zare, Raha Najafi, Hamid Goudarziafshar
Nano-[CuFe2O4@SiO2/propyl-1-(O-vanillinaldimine)][ZnCl2] was prepared by the placement of Schiff base zinc(II) complex on the magnetite core and used as a reusable catalyst for the synthesis of 5-methyl-N,7-diphenyl-4,7-dihydro-[1,2,4]triazolo[1,5-a] pyrimidine-6-carboxamide derivatives.
